00026 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00027 {
00028   ARPCache cache;
00029 
00030   IPAddress ipaddr(MyIPAddr);
00031   EthernetAddr ethernetaddr(MyEthernetAddr);
00032 
00033 
00034   MinetInit(MINET_ARP_MODULE);
00035 
00036   MinetHandle mux = MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_ETHERNET_MUX) ? MinetConnect(MINET_ETHERNET_MUX) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00037   MinetHandle ip = MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_IP_MODULE) ? MinetAccept(MINET_IP_MODULE) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00038 
00039   if (mux==MINET_NOHANDLE && MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_ETHERNET_MUX)) {
00040     MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Can't connect to ethernet mux"));
00041     return -1;
00042   }
00043   if (ip==MINET_NOHANDLE && MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_IP_MODULE)) {
00044     MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Can't accept from ip_module"));
00045     return -1;
00046   }
00047 
00048 
00049   cache.Update(ARPRequestResponse(ipaddr,ethernetaddr,ARPRequestResponse::RESPONSE_OK));
00050 
00051 
00052 
00053   cerr << "arp_module: answering ARPs for " << ipaddr
00054        << " with " << ethernetaddr <<"\n";
00055 
00056   MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("arp_module operational."));
00057 
00058   MinetEvent event;
00059 
00060   while (MinetGetNextEvent(event)==0) {
00061     if (event.eventtype!=MinetEvent::Dataflow
00062         || event.direction!=MinetEvent::IN) {
00063       MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Unknown event ignored."));
00064     } else {
00065       if (event.handle==ip) {
00066         ARPRequestResponse r;
00067         MinetReceive(ip,r);
00068         cerr << "Local Request:  "<<r<<"\n";
00069         cache.Lookup(r);
00070         cerr << "Local Response: "<<r<<"\n";
00071         MinetSend(ip,r);
00072         if (r.flag==ARPRequestResponse::RESPONSE_UNKNOWN) {
00073           ARPPacket request(ARPPacket::Request,
00074                             ethernetaddr,
00075                             ipaddr,
00076                             ETHERNET_BLANK_ADDR,
00077                             r.ipaddr);
00078           EthernetHeader h;
00079           h.SetSrcAddr(ethernetaddr);
00080           h.SetDestAddr(ETHERNET_BROADCAST_ADDR);
00081           h.SetProtocolType(PROTO_ARP);
00082           request.PushHeader(h);
00083 
00084           RawEthernetPacket rawout(request);
00085           MinetSend(mux,rawout);
00086         }
00087       }
00088       if (event.handle==mux) {
00089         RawEthernetPacket rawpacket;
00090         MinetReceive(mux,rawpacket);
00091         ARPPacket arp(rawpacket);
00092 
00093         if (arp.IsIPToEthernet()) {
00094           IPAddress sourceip;
00095           EthernetAddr sourcehw;
00096 
00097           arp.GetSenderIPAddr(sourceip);
00098           arp.GetSenderEthernetAddr(sourcehw);
00099 
00100           ARPRequestResponse r(sourceip,sourcehw,ARPRequestResponse::RESPONSE_OK);
00101           cache.Update(r);
00102 
00103           //cerr << cache << "\n";
00104 
00105           if (arp.IsIPToEthernetRequest()) {
00106             IPAddress targetip;
00107             arp.GetTargetIPAddr(targetip);
00108             if (targetip==ipaddr) {
00109               // reply
00110 
00111               ARPPacket repl(ARPPacket::Reply,
00112                              ethernetaddr,
00113                              ipaddr,
00114                              sourcehw,
00115                              sourceip);
00116 
00117               EthernetHeader h;
00118               h.SetSrcAddr(ethernetaddr);
00119               h.SetDestAddr(sourcehw);
00120               h.SetProtocolType(PROTO_ARP);
00121               repl.PushHeader(h);
00122 
00123               RawEthernetPacket rawout(repl);
00124               MinetSend(mux,rawout);
00125               cerr << "Remote Request:  " << arp <<"\n";
00126               cerr << "Remote Response: " << repl <<"\n";
00127             }
00128           }
00129         }
00130       }
00131     }
00132   }
00133 }
